characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a black SUV
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane highway. A white sedan is ahead in the same lane, and a black SUV is on the right side. The black SUV suddenly merges into the self-vehicles lane, causing a potential collision risk.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while following the white sedan. The black SUV on the right side suddenly merges into the self-vehicles lane, causing the self-vehicle to decelerate to avoid a collision.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 10 meters away, maintaining a steady speed. 2) Right: A black SUV, approximately 5 meters away, merging into the self-vehicles lane.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane urban road. Ahead, a black SUV is traveling in the same lane. The road is relatively clear with moderate traffic. The driver mentions the upcoming exit and the need to change lanes.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed, following the black SUV ahead. The vehicle is preparing to change lanes to the right to take the upcoming exit.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black SUV, approximately 10 meters away, traveling in the same lane, maintaining a consistent speed.
